definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: However, brown rice does not last as long as white rice because of the oil-rich layer of bran.
sentences.chinese: 然而由於富油的麩皮，糙米保存時間不像精米那麼長。

sentences.english: Eat oatmeal at breakfast, choose whole-wheat bread at lunch, or whip up brown rice at dinner instead of white.
sentences.chinese: 早餐燕麥片，中午全麥麪包，晚飯再把精米換成糙米。

sentences.english: Many food studies simply lump brown and white rice together.
sentences.chinese: 很多食品研究都直接歸於糙米和精米的比較。

sentences.english: The group has set a target of one million tons of milled rice exported by 2015.
sentences.chinese: 該組織已經設定了2015年出口百萬噸精米的目標。

sentences.english: The head rice factor had very significantly positive linear relationship to grain quality.
sentences.chinese: 整精米率因子對綜合品質有極顯著正線性關係。

definition: semipolished rice (i.e. rice minus the husk, but including the germ)
grain crops other than rice and wheat
